title: Leveraging TV Coverage to Boost MND Association's Reach | Torchbox

metadata.description: When Coronation Street featured Paul Foreman’s journey with Motor Neurone Disease (MND) in a major storyline, the MND Association saw a remarkable boost in visibility. We helped to enhance this awareness to reach new audiences, drive engagement, and convert interest into tangible support.
